title: Who Will Win in Paris? Velo Picks Every Road Race and Time Trial Medal in the 2024 Olympics
content:
Evenepoel or Van der Poel? Kopecky or Dygert? Velo editors Jim Cotton and Andrew Hood lay their bets for the Olympic time trials and road races.

Read the full article at Who Will Win in Paris? Velo Picks Every Road Race and Time Trial Medal in the 2024 Olympics on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
